explains: n. （尤指族间或血亲间的）仇杀；深仇

sentences.en: She conducted a personal vendetta against me.
He has accused the media of pursuing a vendetta against him.
sentences.cn: 他指责媒体长期跟他过不去。

sentences.en: The vice president said the cartoonist has a personal vendetta against him.
sentences.cn: 这位副总统说那个漫画家同他有个人宿怨。
